Changelog:
Updates:
1. Made some corrections to the Banglish and Nirala layout and bangla date
2. Included 'Typing Mode' Pause Option in the Top Bar.
3. Efforts have been made to address the freezing issue upon closing the application.
4. Added 'Google Input API and Cloud Mode.
5. Remove phonetics of bangla words for Nirala layout users.
6. Auto-completion will now function even when the typing mode is turned off.
7. You can now add numbers to the custom word list.
